GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Document Editor, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync), Excel, Word, PowerPoint, OneNote, OneDrive Storage, Adobe Reader, PDF, Outlook, Office 365
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Speed Dialing, Loudspeaker, Call Divert

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports GSM FR, AAC, WMA, M4A, ASF, AMR-NB, HE-AAC, AAC-LC, MP3, 3G2, AMR
Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports 3GP, 3G2, MP4, H.263, AVI, MPEG4, VC-1, MOV, H.264, AVC, Windows Video, WMV, M4V, Full HD

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (HFP, AVRCP, OPP, PBAP, PAN, A2DP, GATT)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, A-GLONASS, BeiDou, with HERE Drive, HERE Maps, HERE Transit

Other Features.Important Apps: Lync (Corporate IM) Free Download, Company Hub for Enterprise Application, Windows Phone Apps, Nokia Photo Transfer for Mac, Game Features: Touch UI, XBox-Live Hub, DirectX 11, WhatsApp, Skype IM, WeChat, Viber, LINE, Twitter, Yahoo Messenger, Facebook, LinkedIn
Other Features.Sensors: Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Magnetometer

Display.Other Display Features: High Brightness Mode, Easy to Clean, Wide Viewing Angle, Scratch Resistant Glass, Corning Gorilla Glass 3, Double-tap to Wake, Refresh Rate 60 Hz, Brightness Control, Sunlight Readability Enhancements

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
